### Auditing Services Tender Announcement

#### Amendment 001

**Solicitation Number:** CON23-0033

**Posting Date:** 2024-05-24

**Closing Date:** 2024-06-24, 14:00:00 (EST)

The Public Service Commission of Canada invites bidders to submit proposals for Professional Audit Support Services (PASS). This solicitation is for two (2) contracts to be awarded for Stream 1 – Internal Audit Services and Stream 3 – Information Technology and Systems Audits.

**Services Required**

The services require up to two (2) contracts for conducting professional audit services as outlined in the attached documentation. The bidders must submit a proposal for one or all following workstreams:

*   Stream 1: Internal Audit Services, which includes:
    1. Partner/Managing Director
    2. Project Manager/Leader
    3. Senior Auditor
*   Stream 3: Information Technology and Systems Audits, which includes:
    1. Partner/Managing Director
    2. Project Manager/Leader
    3. Senior Auditor

**Length of Contract**

The initial term of the contract shall be for one (1) year. In addition, four (4) option periods of one (1) year each may be exercised at the discretion of the Public Service Commission of Canada.

**Trade Agreements**

This solicitation is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

**Attachments**

A detailed list of attachments, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) package, can be accessed at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38739/con-23-0033--pass_npp.pdf

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Nabil Hamdane at (514) 999-9999 or by e-mail at [nabil.hamdane cfpspsc.gc.ca](mailto:nabil.hamdane@cfp-psc.gc.ca).
